Joshua or Josue__15.1: Now the lot of the children of Juda by their kindreds was this: From the frontier of Edom, to the desert of Sin southward, and to the uttermost part of the south coast.
Joshua or Josue__15.2: Its beginning was from the top of the most salt sea, and from the bay thereof, that looketh to the south.
Joshua or Josue__15.3: And it goeth out towards the ascent of the Scorpion, and passeth on to Sina: and ascendeth into Cadesbarne, and reacheth into Esron, going up to Addar, and compassing Carcaa.
Joshua or Josue__15.4: And from thence passing along into Asemona, and reaching the torrent of Egypt: and the bounds thereof shall be the great sea, this shall be the limit of the south coast.
Joshua or Josue__15.5: But on the east side the beginning shall be the most salt sea even to the end of the Jordan: and towards the north, from the bay of the sea unto the same river Jordan.
Joshua or Josue__15.6: And the border goeth up into Beth-Hagla, and passeth by the north into Beth-Araba: going up to the stone of Boen the son of Ruben.
Joshua or Josue__15.7: And reaching as far as the borders of Debara from the valley of Achor, and so northward looking towards Galgal, which is opposite to the ascent of Adommin, on the south side of the torrent: and the border passeth the waters that are called the fountain of the sun: and the goings out thereof shall be at the fountain Rogel.
Joshua or Josue__15.8: And it goeth up by the valley of the son of Ennom on the side of the Jebusite towards the south, the same is Jerusalem: and thence ascending to the top of the mountain, which is over against Geennom to the west in the end of the valley of Raphaim, northward.
Joshua or Josue__15.9: And it passeth on from the top of the mountain to the fountain of the water of Nephtoa: and reacheth to the towns of mount Ephron: and it bendeth towards Baala, which is Cariathiarim, that is to say, the city of the woods.
Joshua or Josue__15.10: And it compasseth from Baala westward unto mount Seir: and passeth by the side of mount Jarim to the north into Cheslon: and goeth down into Bethsames, and passeth into Thamna.
Joshua or Josue__15.11: And it reacheth northward to a part of Accaron at the side: and bendeth to Sechrona, and passeth mount Baala: and cometh into Jebneel, and is bounded westward with the great sea.
Joshua or Josue__15.12: These are the borders round about of the children of Juda in their kindreds.
Joshua or Josue__15.13: But to Caleb the son of Jephone he gave a portion in the midst of the children of Juda, as the Lord had commanded him: Cariath-Arbe the father of Enac. which is Hebron.
Joshua or Josue__15.14: And Caleb destroyed out of it the three sons of Ehac, Sesai and Ahiman. and Tholmai of the race of Enac.
Joshua or Josue__15.15: And going up from thence he came to the inhabitants of Dabir, which before was called Cariath-Sepher, that is to say, the city of letters.
Joshua or Josue__15.16: And Caleb said: He that shall smite Cariath-Sepher, and take it, I will give him Axa my daughter to wife.
Joshua or Josue__15.17: And Othoniel the son of Cenez, the younger brother of Caleb, took it: and he gave him Axa his daughter to wife.
Joshua or Josue__15.18: And as they were going together, she was moved by her husband to ask a field of her father, and she sighed as she sat on her ass. And Caleb said to her: What aileth thee?
Joshua or Josue__15.19: But she answered: Give me a blessing: thou hast given me a southern and dry land, give me also a land that is watered. And Caleb gave her the upper and the nether watery ground.
Joshua or Josue__15.20: This is the possession of the tribe of the children of Juda by their kindreds.
Joshua or Josue__15.21: And the cities from the uttermost parts of the children of Juda by the borders of Edom to the south, were Cabseel and Eder and Jagur,
Joshua or Josue__15.22: And Cina and Dimona and Adada,
Joshua or Josue__15.23: And Cades and Asor and Jethnam,
Joshua or Josue__15.25: New Asor and Carioth, Hesron, which is Asor.
Joshua or Josue__15.27: And Asergadda and Hassemon and Bethphelet,
Joshua or Josue__15.28: And Hasersual and Bersabee and Baziothia,
Joshua or Josue__15.29: And Baala and Jim and Esem,
Joshua or Josue__15.30: And Eltholad and Cesil and Harma,
Joshua or Josue__15.31: And Siceleg and Medemena and Sensenna,
Joshua or Josue__15.32: Lebaoth and Selim and Aen and Remmon: all the cities twenty-nine, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.33: But in the plains: Estaol and Sarea and Asena,
Joshua or Josue__15.34: And Zanoe and Engannim and Taphua and Enaim,
Joshua or Josue__15.35: And Jerimoth and Adullam, Socho and Azeca,
Joshua or Josue__15.36: And Saraim and Adithaim and Gedera and Gederothaim: fourteen cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.41: And Gideroth and Bethdagon and Naama and Maceda: sixteen cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.44: And Ceila and Achzib and Maresa: nine cities, and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.45: Accaron with the towns and villages thereof.
Joshua or Josue__15.46: From Accaron even to the sea: all places that lie towards Azotus and the villages thereof.
Joshua or Josue__15.47: Azotus with its towns and villages. Gaza with its towns and villages, even to the torrent of Egypt, and the great sea that is the border thereof.
Joshua or Josue__15.48: And in the mountain Samir and Jether and Socoth,
Joshua or Josue__15.49: And Danna and Cariath-senna, this is Dabir:
Joshua or Josue__15.51: Gosen and Olon and Gilo: eleven cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.53: And Janum and Beththaphua and Apheca,
Joshua or Josue__15.54: Athmatha and Cariath-Arbe, this is Hebron and Sior: nine cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.55: Maon and Carmel and Ziph and Jota,
Joshua or Josue__15.57: Accain, Gabaa and Thamna: ten cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.59: Mareth, and Bethanoth, and Eltecon: six cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.60: Cariathbaal, the same is Cariathiarim, the city of woods, and Arebba: two cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.61: In the desert Betharaba, Meddin and Sachacha,
Joshua or Josue__15.62: And Nebsan, and the city of salt, and Engaddi: six cities and their villages.
Joshua or Josue__15.63: But the children of Juda could not destroy the Jebusite that dwelt in Jerusalem: and the Jebusite dwelt with the children of Juda in Jerusalem until this present day.
